hello.description: Script that says hello back for each argument

q-aws-lambda-tf.description: Quarkus AWS Lambda template with Terraform template. Use the -Dnative-function flag to have native image based Terraform resources

mode.description: Quarkus Lambda mode: simple or funq

tf-providers.description: If enabled extra Terraform related providers will be generated

tf-provider-aws-version.description: Version of the AWS Terraform provider

tf-provider-archive-version.description: Version of the Archive Terraform provider

tf-provider-null-version.description: Version of the NULL Terraform provider

aws-vpc-integration.description: AWSLambdaVPCAccessExecutionRole will be added to the lambda function

aws-lambda-logging.description: If logging should be enabled or not

native-function.description: Native executable based lambda or not

lambda-handler.description: Lambda handler method's name. By default it will be decided by the 'mode' property, but could be overriden.
